content: **size** child adult **measurements** width 11 5 13 cm / 4 5 23 6 length 117 131 cm / 46 51 5 **materials** bella coco merino child size 1 ball in shade porcelain 02 a 1 ball in shade heather 24 b adult size 2 ball of bella coco merino in shade ivory 01 a 1 ball of bella coco merino print in shade berry crush 32 b **hook** crochet hook 4 mm / us g/6 or size needed to achieve gauge **yarn quality** bella coco merino hobbii 100 % wool 50 g 1 75 oz = 165 m 180 yds **gauge** 23 sts x 27 row = 10 cm x 10 cm / 4 x 4 measured over the main stitch pattern **pattern information** this scarf is made using a neutral shade paired with a pop of colour in either solid or print to give a striking stripy design this pattern uses the moss stitch which is a combination of chains and single_crochet you ll be crocheting from side to side meaning you ll be working in long row enjoy instructions for both child and adult sizes meaning you can make one for the whole family photo credit nicola white
